channel.title: How to put pics on a post
channel.description:
please is this is the wrong section this is the section i was told but if it is wrong mods dont lock just move plzz
i did not take this is just ade it for the people that ask this quest plz dont flam spam and if i forgot something please tell
hello as you no my name is alex4ever
this is a simple little way to put pics on your post
step 1: you need to take the picture but pressing print screen buy clicking the button up on the top of the key bored
step 2: go to print and go to edit and click past
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/6391/editpastoy1.png[/img][/URL]
click save and save it as something
step 3: then go to www.imageshack.us
and register
after that go to browse
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img61.imageshack.us/img61/1358/imageshackjq2.png[/img][/URL]
step 4: then click browse and u will get a Pop up like this
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/390/thepopupxv8.png[/img][/URL]
when you click the picture u will click host it
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/1570/hostituz5.png[/img][/URL]
then u get this thing click the one that has the colors around it
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img95.imageshack.us/img95/3162/clickitis6.png[/img][/URL]
then copy it and past it on what u want and it will show up there
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ok this is how to use photobucket
step 1: u gotta register at photobucket
[IMG]http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s239/whatyoucare/clickit.jpg[/img]
step 2: after that u gatta take the pic just like the imageshack u gatta take a pic and past it on paint buy pressing print screen
step 3: go to paint and past
[IMG]http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s239/whatyoucare/likethis.jpg[/img]
step 4: press the x in the top corner a pop up will come up but save it and put it under something so your will remember it incase something happens
[IMG]http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s239/whatyoucare/pastitlikethis.jpg[/img]
step 5: click browse and find what u put it under
[IMG]http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s239/whatyoucare/clickthis.jpg[/img]
step 6: then u will have 3 options
IMG Code HTML Tag URL Link
click on the img code it will auto maticly cope just put the img code on the topic or post and there u have it
please is this is the wrong section this is the section i was told but if it is wrong mods dont lock just move plzz
i did not take this is just ade it for the people that ask this quest plz dont flam spam and if i forgot something please tell
today it moparscape cm/mod/admin week i think we should all thank all the moparscape cm/mod/admins for all the help and congrats to lin for getting 60 rep with out a warning and all the other cm ty Mod Taharok,Miss Silabsoft,Nwfd1025,

i have photobucket now so please leave a post if read this ty

item.title: How to put pics on a post
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

please is this is the wrong section this is the section i was told but if it is wrong mods dont lock just move plzz

i did not take this is just ade it for the people that ask this quest plz dont flam spam and if i forgot something please tell

hello as you no my name is alex4ever

this is a simple little way to put pics on your post

step 1:
you need to take the picture but pressing
print screen buy clicking the button up on the top of the key bored

step 2:
go to print and go to edit and click past

click save and save it as something

step 3:
then go to www.imageshack.us

and register

after that go to browse

step 4:
then click browse and u will get a Pop up
like this

when you click the picture u will click host it

then u get this thing click the one that has the colors around it

then copy it and past it on what u want and it will show up there

ok this is how to use photobucket

step 1:
u gotta register at photobucket

clickit.jpg800×600

step 2:
after that u gatta take the pic just like the imageshack u gatta take a pic and past it on paint buy pressing print screen

step 3:
go to paint and past

likethis.jpg800×600

step 4:
press the x in the top corner a pop up will come up but save it and put it under something so your will remember it incase something happens

pastitlikethis.jpg800×600

step 5:
click browse and find what u put it under

clickthis.jpg800×600

step 6:
then u will have 3 options

IMG Code
HTML Tag
URL Link

click on the img code it will auto maticly cope just put the img code on the topic or post and there u have it

please is this is the wrong section this is the section i was told but if it is wrong mods dont lock just move plzz

i did not take this is just ade it for the people that ask this quest plz dont flam spam and if i forgot something please tell

i think we should all thank all the moparscape cm/mod/admins for all the help
and congrats to lin for getting 60 rep with out a warning and all the other cm
ty Mod Taharok,Miss Silabsoft,Nwfd1025,
